wikipedia_page.main: Admiral Sir James Henry Fuller Eberle,  (31 May 1927 – 17 May 2018) was a senior officer in the Royal Navy who served as Commander-in-Chief Fleet from 1979 until 1981.

response: |Maggie Clay, James Eberle, Norman Lamont, George Robertson

On NATO staff, Captain Meyer served with Admirals John Fieldhouse, James Eberle and Henry Leach. The president of the Mess at their headquarters, HMS Warrior, was Lord Louis Mountbatten. The Frasers of Three Rivers were neighbors and family friends of Captain Meyer and his family.  Captain Meyer's father, George Earl Meyer served on the Texas border in the aftermath of the Mexican revolution during General John J. Pershing's expedition into Mexico.Official Biography, Dan Meyer, Director of Civilian Reprisal Investigations, Office of the Inspector General, U.S. Department of Defense (2003) (distributed at Cornell University presentation, October 12, 2003). The "Meyer" surname is the subject of a Wikipedia article, as well.
